name: Good Pizza Food Delivery Boy
description:
The story of the pizza delivery boy who deliver the fast food in different locations of the city within time duration. Pick up junk food from a pizza restaurant and deliver on assigned location. A pizza boy rider picks up a parcel from a different junk hot pizza food restaurant and deliver on assign locations such as home of the town. You will order any fast food from the pizza maker shop and drop your current location for food delivery. The good pizza delivers to your current location within the limited time.

Features:

• Make different delicious hot pizza flavours in your fast-food restaurant
• Take orders from regular customers and deliver them at their assigned location
• Deliver all junk food, hot pizza, burgers around the city
• Pack the pizza in boxes and deliver them
• Try to complete your order within the time duration
